mapper.sql: id, account, password, power, create_time, update_time, create_account, update_account, is_del
mapper.select:
select
from account where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_del = 0
mapper.insert:

id,
account,

power,

mapper.update:
update account
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
power = #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_account = #{createAccount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_account = #{updateAccount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update account set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power = #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_account = #{createAccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_account = #{updateAccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from account where account = #{username} and is_del = 0
